main.views module¶

main.views.home_view(request)[source]¶

This method will create a home page request. It will pass logged in user’s user name and a welcome message in the home page.

Parameters

  • name – request - used to generate responses(Http) depending on the request that it receives

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns home page
